features: Plump up the volume: The 13-fluid Ounce bottle of OGX Thick and full, Biotin and collagen conditioner gives thin strands a thickening boost, volumizing them into fuller and more abundant-looking locks
Thicker, fuller, healthier: ideal for flat to medium volume Hair, this volumizing conditioner leaves hair feeling thicker and healthy-looking as it helps hair feel detangled

Hair Care inspired by nature: the nutrient-rich, plump-it-up formula contains Vitamin B7 Biotin, which helps strengthen hair to maintain growth, collagen, a building block for healthy hair, and hydrolyzed wheat protein

All-around sensory experience: the bergamot, jasmine and vanilla scent Leaves your locks smelling irresistibly good every time you lather up. Plus the sulfate-free surfactant hair care system is paraben-free and gentle On your tresses
Beauty pure and simple: for best results, use this full hair conditioner with the entire OGX Biotin and collagen hair care collection to help infuse nutrients into every strand.
body.description: Boost your curls with OGX Quenching + Coconut Curls Conditioner. Ideal for medium to coarse-textured hair, this curl-enhancing conditioner helps detangle and define for tumbling waves full of bounce and shine. Designed to enhance natural softness, the curly hair conditioner also tames frizz as it quenches and hydrates your decadent spirals, leaving them looking smooth & bouncy. The nourishing blend contains coconut oil, which helps add luster and softness to hair, citrus oil to help clarify and reveal shine, and sweet honey, which has humectant and emollient properties that make it a great hair moisturizer. Plus, the coconut water, white orange & tonka bean scent makes conditioning your hair an all-around sensory experience that leaves locks with an irresistibly good smell. Paraben-free with sulfate-free surfactants, this nourishing coconut conditioner represents beauty, pure and simple. For a full quenching curly hair care routine, pair with OGX Coconut Curls Shampoo & Hair Butter.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: About Us We’re beauty, pure and simple. So unattainable looks don’t inspire us, but originality does. That’s why we love being different; from our exotic ingredients, to the shape of our bottles, to our quest for sustainability —we approach beauty in our own way.

OGX Quenching + Coconut Curls Conditioner OGX Coconut Fine Curls Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Coconut Miracle Oil Conditioner OGX 5-in-1 Keratin Smoothing Oil Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Biotin & Collagen Conditioner OGX Extra Strength Teatree Mint Conditioner Hair Type Medium / Thick Curls Fine Curls / Wavy Damaged / Weakened Frizz-Prone Fine / Flat All Hair Types Hair Goal *Up to 5x Stronger *Up to 5x Stronger *Up to 82% Less Breakage in one use Tame Frizz, Humidity Protection, Strengthen + Shine *Fuller-Looking, Healthier-Looking Hair *Remove Scalp Buildup Without Stripping Key Ingredient Coconut Oil + Honey + Citrus Oil Coconut Water + Flaxseed Coconut Oil + Vanilla Bean Extract + Essence of Tiare Keratin Protein + Argan Oil + Ceramides Biotin + Collagen + Bamboo Fiber Extract Teatree Oil + Peppermint Extract + Witch Hazel Scent Coconut, Tangerine + Warm Vanilla Coconut, Jasmine + Peach Coconut Milk, Warm Vanilla + Tangerine Golden Amber, Tropical Orange + Madagascar Vanilla Bergamot, Jasmine + Vanilla Sweet Peppermint, Tea Tree + Iced Vanilla Contains Sulfates? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect Hydration, good for humid environment, highly recommended for both women and men!
reviews.reviewText: **Update** : Everything is great except for a small detail. I hope they consider redesigning the bottle with a pump. The current design requires a lot of effort to squeeze, especially when there's only a little left at the bottom.This Conditioner is a transformative addition to any hair care routine. I promise you will feel the difference!Its blend of coconut and citrus oils with honey offers a tropical scent experience and superior performance, especially in combating humidity-induced frizz.This conditioner will make your hair styling smoother, providing bouncy, well-defined curls that last all day. The deeply nourishing, sulfate-free, and paraben-free formula is gentle yet effective, making it suitable for both women and men.For anyone searching for an effective, frizz-controlling, and hydrating conditioner, this OGX product stands out as an excellent choice. It delivers on all fronts - hydration, frizz control, and manageability for healthy, beautiful curls.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My hair loves this! I was experiencing dry brittle ends. I swim a lot in pools and the ocean. This packs moisture back into my hair, props up my sometimes droopy curls, and adds sheen. Plus it smells yummy!! Not for oily hair, but perfect for dry or broken hair.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This conditioner helps tame my curly hair and has a pleasant coconut scent. I have since used conditioners that moisturize and help control my hair better, but they cost three times as much. Try it and find out which works best for you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars By far one of the best for curly hair
reviews.reviewText: I use this as a conditioner and leave in and it always has my curls looking so good

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My curly hair did so well with this one! And it smells so good!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love this product it leaves my hair soft and doesn’t dry it up. I have re purchase this product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars This will make your hair super greasy
reviews.reviewText: I don’t put this on my roots and I don’t apply too much of this product because it will make your hair super greasy. It is very thick and hard to apply. It does moisturize well and helps with frizz somewhat. It also smells great. It’s a good value, but it’s not the best product. My curls weren’t that defined afterwards like other products I’ve used.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Makes my hair feel silky and gives it nice curls!
Me ayudo mucho a quitar la resequedad y friz de mi cabello, también me deja muy suave y brilloso mi cabello, tiene un aroma bastante agradable, rinde mucho y es un excelente producto.
Love the smell and leaves hair super soft .. only issue is that it’s hard to squeeze out of the bottle
I use this conditioner a lot but stores nearby aren't selling it anymore so I knew I had to get it online and I'm glad I could. Thanks
